tasks.label: BUILD
tasks.command: docker rmi ${workspaceFolderBasename} 2>$null; docker build -t ${workspaceFolderBasename} .; docker image prune -f

tasks.label: RUN
tasks.command: docker stop ${workspaceFolderBasename} 2>$null; docker rm -f ${workspaceFolderBasename} 2>$null; docker run --name ${workspaceFolderBasename} --env-file .env -p 8080:8080 ${workspaceFolderBasename}
